GetOrder.Statement: SELECT * FROM w2_FixedPurchase WHERE fixed_purchase_kbn = '01' -- 毎月Ｘ日に定期購入 AND ( @target_day = CONVERT(int, fixed_purchase_setting1) OR ((@target_day > 28) AND (fixed_purchase_setting1 = '-1')) ) AND fixed_purchase_status <> '30' -- キャンセル以外（通常、在庫エラー、決済エラー）はとりあえず実行 AND payment_status <> '11' -- 決済失敗のときは実行しない AND valid_flg = '1'

GetPayment.Statement: SELECT w2_Payment.* FROM w2_Payment WHERE w2_Payment.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_Payment.payment_id = @payment_id

GetPaymentPrice.Statement: SELECT w2_Payment.shop_id, w2_Payment.payment_id, w2_Payment.payment_name, w2_Payment.payment_price_kbn, w2_PaymentPrice.* FROM w2_Payment, w2_PaymentPrice WHERE w2_Payment.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_Payment.payment_id = @payment_id AND w2_Payment.shop_id = w2_PaymentPrice.shop_id AND w2_Payment.payment_id = w2_PaymentPrice.payment_id AND ( w2_Payment.payment_price_kbn = '0' OR w2_Payment.payment_price_kbn = '1' AND w2_PaymentPrice.tgt_price_bgn <= @sub_total_price AND w2_PaymentPrice.tgt_price_end >= @sub_total_price )
